description.gm: Epitome When The Waxworks is epitomized, an unsettling laboratory comes into being in the dungeons below Harrowheart. Here, bubbling cauldrons of wax sputter and smoke, while metal molds containing the likenesses of the PCs and significant NPCs from their past stand unnervingly along the walls. The laboratory is attended by a sallow-complexioned tiefling who is always way too excited and polite to visiting PCs. This tiefling knows the rituals for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Clone] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Simulacrum], and can teach them to the PCs. Skill checks attempted in the laboratory to perform either of these rituals gain a +2 item bonus.
description.value:
Suit Shield (Con)

Alignment chaotic evil

The Waxworks represents helplessness and entropy. As long as you have this card invested, you gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects that render you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued]. The item bonus increases to +3 if you are 20th level.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You cause two @Template[type:line|distance:30]s of hot wax to extend out of the card as you present it. The two lines must both start at you and extend in different directions. If you are at least 15th level, you can create a third line, and if you're at least 19th level you can create a fourth line. All creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against your class DC or spell DC.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes [[/r 2d6[persistent,fire],2d6[persistent,mental]]]{2d6 persistent fire damage and 2d6 persistent mental} damage. An affected creature or adjacent ally can reduce both of these values by 1d6 by spending an Interact action to scrape off the goo. Until the damage is reduced to 1d6 per type, the affected creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused] (this is an emotion and mental effect).

Failure As success, but [[/r 4d6[persistent,fire],4d6[persistent,mental]]]{4d6 persistent fire damage and 4d6 persistent mental} damage.

Critical Failure As success, but [[/r 6d6[persistent,fire],6d6[persistent,mental]]]{6d6 persistent fire damage and 6d6 persistent mental} damage, and the creature's speed is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} until the damage is reduced to 1d6 per type.
